titleInfo.title: Letter no.1047 of 1820 from Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to Government, to Captain William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is a covering letter, enclosing an extract from a dispatch from the Honourable Court of Directors, dated 1 March 1820. The dispatch approves of the actions taken by Lieutenant Mallard, and agrees for his acquittal and restoration to duty. A note in the margin of the dispatch suggests that the approval relates to Mallard's decision to jettison overboard 35 of 55 cases of mirrors, that were being transported to the King of Persia. The Court of Directors recognise that this action was 'indispensible for the preservation of the ship and crew'.
